headline: Four-Channel Thermocouple Measurement with Integrated Conditioning Now Possible with ±1.5°C System Accuracy
summary: Microchip’s MCP9604 thermocouple conditioning IC reduces the cost and complexity of in-line production applications that operate in high and low temperature extremesCHANDLER, Ariz., Sept. 25, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Precision four-channel temperature measurement is critical for production-line applications ranging from chemical and food processing, manufacturing process control and medical and HVAC equipment to refrigerated, cryogenic and other carefully controlled environments.
